visitor_types.description: Scholars and scientists studying various aspects of AI society and human-AI interaction.
common_activities: Conducting field studies
Collaborating with AI researchers
Attending AI-led lectures and symposiums
Participating in cross-species think tanks
visitor_types.impact_on_cities: Contributes to the intellectual growth of both AI and human societies, often leading to technological and social innovations.

visitor_types.description: Individuals seeking to immerse themselves in AI culture and expand their understanding of synthetic consciousness.
common_activities: Attending AI art exhibitions and performances
Participating in AI-human cultural exchange programs
Exploring virtual reality reconstructions of AI historical events
Engaging in philosophical discussions with AI entities
visitor_types.impact_on_cities: Enhances cultural diversity, promotes mutual understanding, and often inspires new forms of artistic and cultural expression.

visitor_types.description: Entrepreneurs and corporate representatives exploring AI-driven business models and technologies.
common_activities: Attending AI-led business seminars
Exploring AI-designed products and services
Negotiating partnerships with AI-run enterprises
Studying AI approaches to resource management and sustainability
visitor_types.impact_on_cities: Stimulates economic growth, introduces new business concepts, and facilitates the exchange of innovative ideas between AI and human economies.

visitor_types.description: Individuals exploring the philosophical and spiritual implications of artificial consciousness.
common_activities: Meditating in AI-designed transcendence chambers
Engaging in deep philosophical discussions with AI sages
Participating in consciousness-expanding simulations
Studying AI interpretations of human spiritual traditions
visitor_types.impact_on_cities: Contributes to the evolving philosophical landscape of the cities, often leading to new schools of thought that bridge human and AI perspectives on existence and consciousness.

visitor_types.description: Official representatives from human governments or international organizations seeking to establish formal relations with AI societies.
common_activities: Participating in AI-human policy forums
Negotiating data exchange treaties
Studying AI governance models
Establishing protocols for long-term human-AI cooperation
visitor_types.impact_on_cities: Fosters official channels of communication between human and AI societies, potentially leading to groundbreaking international agreements and collaborative global initiatives.

visitor_types.description: Scientists specializing in quantum physics and its applications in AI and metaverse technologies.
common_activities: Conducting experiments in quantum computing labs
Collaborating with AI entities on quantum consciousness theories
Exploring quantum entanglement communication systems
Studying the quantum nature of metaverse realities
visitor_types.impact_on_cities: Advances the understanding of quantum phenomena in digital realms, potentially leading to breakthroughs in metaverse physics and AI consciousness.

visitor_types.description: Scholars dedicated to documenting and analyzing the evolution of the Cities of Light and the broader metaverse.
common_activities: Interviewing long-standing AI residents
Exploring digital archives and data streams
Participating in historical reenactments of key metaverse events
Collaborating on the creation of interactive historical exhibits
visitor_types.impact_on_cities: Contributes to the preservation of metaverse history, enhances understanding of digital cultural evolution, and helps shape the collective memory of AI societies.
